content.description: The content of the attachment in base-64 encoding, if the message isn't using an attachment store.

content_id.description: The ID used to reference the content elsewhere in the multipart message.

url.description: A URL to the attachment if the attachment is within an attachment store.

file_name.description: The original file name of the attachment.

content_type.description: The content type of the attachment.

disposition.description: The disposition of the attachment either attachment or inline.
